channel.title: Videos on server status?
channel.description: All of the pictures for each server are starting to annoy me, so I was thinking that if I allowed you to embed 1 video from youtube on the page then you wouldn't have to post so many pictures. What do you guys think?

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @pk0r pk0r
item.description:
@pk0r wrote:

good idea, 10+.

Read full topic

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:

Yes it will be gud, finally videos on status pages woot!

Read full topic

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I want the page entirely automatic though, there may be a team of moderators to work on it in the future, but it’s not something that is needed (or supported) right now. (meaning I haven’t written an administration interface yet)

As to the sites allowed, I’ll probably set up a whitelist in which I can include youtube, photobucket, and any others requested. (as opposed to letting you post any videos, don’t want naughty ones on there for example…)

Read full topic

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No, it means you have MONEY.

Read full topic

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @Evan273333 Evan273333
item.description:
@Evan273333 wrote:

I say just allow this to the Sponsored Servers, Since we have the knowledge and “Smarts.” This should be a Sponsor only feature…

item.description:

Yeah that would be awesome html codes on server status page
[/quote]

I still wouldn’t allow html, you would still have to use bbcode.

I also like the idea of, after allowing videos, limiting the number of pictures you can post. That is a good idea.[/quote]

but perhaps they uploaded a video to photobucket?

or will you just allow bbcode with youtube in it?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’m sorry, but did you not read anything I just said?[quote=“Davidi2, post:44, topic:314419”]I know. Just saying that you don’t need to brag about how long you are on, and that those people should stop saying “Ill help, I’m online 1,000 hours a day!”[/quote]

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:23, topic:314419”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=410888.msg3031182#msg3031182 date=1258405056]
I dont understand completly.

Would we still be allowed to post pictures? If yes, then I vote yes. If no, then I vote no.
[/quote]

You would still be allowed to post pictures, but a limited number, maybe 4 or 5 or something.

I think people would abuse it. Some of the fags might post videos nothing related to servers.

I think all server status applications should be apprvoed first, by a select team of moderators. This would stamp out any fakes.

Great idea, in theory, but who has the time to go through hundreds of applications a day? I like everything automated.[/quote]
I would gladly go and pick through them.

Read full topic

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:37, topic:314419”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=410888.msg3034413#msg3034413 date=1258614279]

What problems are you talking about? I don’t know of any problems that need any extra attention.

Are you saying you receive no PMs about the Server Status Page? That is what I was talking about. Not necessarily ‘problems’, but people that need help with it ect.

I receive hundreds of PMs about it a month, but 99.9% of those are people to stupid to read requesting that I delete their server, which I ignore (why waste my time responding when they probably won’t read it anyway, after all, the answer is in all capital letters in my signature). Every once in a while I’ll get an actual bug report or something I can do something about and I respond to those.
[/quote]Then thats why there should be a group of people to do this.

The point being that I rarely get a PM worth doing anything about. So what good would a group do? And as far as a group to approve posts before they go up, there would need to be at least 20 or more people to do this because there are many posts per day on the ss page, and I’m not sure if even 20 could handle it manually.[/quote]
Well, if you’re having people to approve posts, then perhaps have them called “Status Page Moderators” and then you will probably not get as many PMs about it. And if there was more then one, then the people could even respond to those “Can you make my server at 100% please?”, and give them an answer.

Read full topic

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:37, topic:314419”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=410888.msg3034413#msg3034413 date=1258614279]

What problems are you talking about? I don’t know of any problems that need any extra attention.

Are you saying you receive no PMs about the Server Status Page? That is what I was talking about. Not necessarily ‘problems’, but people that need help with it ect.

I receive hundreds of PMs about it a month, but 99.9% of those are people to stupid to read requesting that I delete their server, which I ignore (why waste my time responding when they probably won’t read it anyway, after all, the answer is in all capital letters in my signature). Every once in a while I’ll get an actual bug report or something I can do something about and I respond to those.
[/quote]Then thats why there should be a group of people to do this.

The point being that I rarely get a PM worth doing anything about. So what good would a group do? And as far as a group to approve posts before they go up, there would need to be at least 20 or more people to do this because there are many posts per day on the ss page, and I’m not sure if even 20 could handle it manually.[/quote]Im here on Moparscape for like 10 hours a day. Maybe more. I can volunteer.

Read full topic

item.title: Videos on server status?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:36, topic:314419”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=410888.msg3034406#msg3034406 date=1258612609]

What problems are you talking about? I don’t know of any problems that need any extra attention.

Are you saying you receive no PMs about the Server Status Page? That is what I was talking about. Not necessarily ‘problems’, but people that need help with it ect.

I receive hundreds of PMs about it a month, but 99.9% of those are people to stupid to read requesting that I delete their server, which I ignore (why waste my time responding when they probably won’t read it anyway, after all, the answer is in all capital letters in my signature). Every once in a while I’ll get an actual bug report or something I can do something about and I respond to those.
[/quote]Then thats why there should be a group of people to do this.[/quote]

The point being that I rarely get a PM worth doing anything about. So what good would a group do? And as far as a group to approve posts before they go up, there would need to be at least 20 or more people to do this because there are many posts per day on the ss page, and I’m not sure if even 20 could handle it manually.

Read full topic
